results.title: Labetalol, beta blockers, and acute deterioration of chronic airway obstruction.
results.text_hl: On these acute studies, the order of preference for beta blocking drugs in management of @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@ in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Airway_Obstruction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000402 @@@obstructive airways disease@@@, would be @CHEMICAL_Labetalol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D007741 @@@labetalol@@@, (@<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@) or (metoprolol) and then @CHEMICAL_Propranolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011433 @@@propranolol@@@.

citations.NLM: Adam WR, Meagher EJ, Barter CE. Labetalol, beta blockers, and acute deterioration of chronic airway obstruction. Clin Exp Hypertens A. 1982;4(8):1419-28. PMID: 6126285

results.title: Comparison of the effects of single doses of atenolol and labetalol on airways obstruction in patients with hypertension and asthma.
results.text_hl: Comparison of the effects of single doses of @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Labetalol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D007741 @@@labetalol@@@ on @<m>DISEASE_Airway_Obstruction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000402 @@@airways obstruction@@@ in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@ and @DISEASE_Asthma @DISEASE_MESH:D001249 @@@asthma@@@.

results.title: Comparative evaluation of cardioselectivity of metoprolol OROS and atenolol: a double-blind, placebo-controlled crossover study.
results.text_hl: Cardioselectivity of a single oral dose of @CHEMICAL_Metoprolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008790 @@@metoprolol@@@ oral osmotic (OROS) (14/190 mg) and @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ (100 mg) was compared in 12 @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Airway_Obstruction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000402 @@@reversible obstructive airway disease@@@ by assessing the dose-response curve to increasing doses of inhaled @CHEMICAL_Albuterol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000420 @@@salbutamol@@@.

citations.NLM: Tantucci C, Bruni B, Dottorini ML, Peccini F, Motolese M, Lecaillon JB, Sorbini CA, Grassi V. Comparative evaluation of cardioselectivity of metoprolol OROS and atenolol: a double-blind, placebo-controlled crossover study. Am Heart J. 1990 Aug;120(2):467-72. PMID: 2200257

results.title: Osmotic release oral drug delivery system of metoprolol in hypertensive asthmatic patients. Pharmacodynamic effects on beta 2-adrenergic receptors.
results.text_hl: The median cumulative @CHEMICAL_Albuterol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000420 @@@salbutamol@@@ concentrations causing a 50% @<m>DISEASE_Airway_Obstruction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000402 @@@increase in specific airway conductance@@@ were 416 and 384 micrograms (days 1 and 7, respectively) for placebo, 594 and 444 micrograms for @CHEMICAL_Metoprolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008790 @@@metoprolol@@@, and 562 and 1419 micrograms for @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@.

citations.NLM: Bauer K, Kaik G, Kaik B. Osmotic release oral drug delivery system of metoprolol in hypertensive asthmatic patients. Pharmacodynamic effects on beta 2-adrenergic receptors. Hypertension. 1994 Sep;24(3):339-46. PMID: 7916004
citations.BibTeX: @article{7916004, title={Osmotic release oral drug delivery system of metoprolol in hypertensive asthmatic patients. Pharmacodynamic effects on beta 2-adrenergic receptors.}, author={Bauer K and Kaik G and Kaik B}, journal={Hypertension}, volume={24}, number={3}, pages={339-46}}

results.title: Pharmacological characteristics of beta blockers and their role in clinical practice.
results.text_hl: Cardioselectivity refers to the ability of some drugs, notably @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Metoprolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008790 @@@metoprolol@@@, to block beta 1 receptors without blocking beta 2 receptors.

citations.NLM: McDevitt DG. Pharmacological characteristics of beta blockers and their role in clinical practice. J Cardiovasc Pharmacol. 1986;8 Suppl 6():S5-11. PMID: 2439820
citations.BibTeX: @article{2439820, title={Pharmacological characteristics of beta blockers and their role in clinical practice.}, author={McDevitt DG}, journal={J Cardiovasc Pharmacol}, volume={8 Suppl 6}, pages={S5-11}}
